programme.title: It's Only the End of the World
programme.desc: After years away, a prize-winning dramatist returns to his hometown to tell his family that he's dying. French-Canadian drama, starring Nathalie Baye, Vincent Cassel, Marion Cotillard and Lea Seydoux

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Dead
programme.desc: Premiere. Wounded amnesiac crook Brian Barnes goes on the run from a drug lord, a crooked sheriff and the DEA. Thriller, starring Johnny Messner, Danny Trejo and Dolph Lundgren

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond: Special
programme.desc: The making of the latest instalment in the sci-fi series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy reboot, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast

programme.title: Love Of My Life
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a fatal brain tumour accepts her fate without fuss, but then her first husband pitches up vowing to win her back. Romantic comedy, starring Anna Chancellor, John Hannah and Hermione Norris

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Premiere. A gunslinger is driven to renounce violence by a tragedy, and decides to make peace with his father, a preacher who disapproved of his past actions. He discovers his father's home town is under threat from a gang in the employ of a crooked banker, forcing him to take up his guns once more to defend the residents. Western, starring Kiefer and Donald Sutherland, with Brian Cox and Demi Moore

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Dead
programme.desc: Premiere. Wounded amnesiac crook Brian Barnes goes on the run from a drug lord, a crooked sheriff and the DEA. Thriller, starring Johnny Messner, Danny Trejo and Dolph Lundgren

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Premiere. Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Premiere. Undead warrior Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her. Action horror, starring Kate Beckinsale, Theo James and Charles Dance

programme.desc: Premiere. After their exploits in We Still Kill the Old Way, criminal outfit the Archer Gang encounters an old enemy when a daring heist ends with them behind bars. Prison drama, starring Ian Ogilvy, Billy Murray and Lysette Anthony

programme.title: Heaven Knows What
programme.desc: Premiere. A heroin addict roams the streets of New York trying to raise enough money to support her habit. She remains desperately devoted to her neglectful boyfriend, who drifts in and out of her life, and reaches a turning point in her life after he tries to persuade her to commit suicide. Drama, starring Arielle Holmes and Caleb Landry Jones

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz musician Chet Baker battles drug addiction and struggles to launch a comeback. Drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo and Callum Keith Rennie(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz musician Chet Baker battles drug addiction and struggles to launch a comeback. Drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo and Callum Keith Rennie(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Southern Fury
programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander

programme.title: Goat
programme.desc: New college student Brad is desperate to fit into his new surroundings, so taking a cue from his older brother, he decides to pledge a fraternity. All goes well at first as he attends parties and meets several girls, but as he enters into the final stretch of the pledging ritual-known as hell week, Brad finds things taking a violent turn as he has to endure a series of brutal initiation rituals. Fact-based drama, with Ben Schnetzer and Nick Jonas

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: 10 Cent Pistol
programme.desc: A pair of low-life criminal brothers target the powerful LA mobster who left one of them rotting in prison. Crime caper, starring Jena Malone and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowe's romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey

programme.title: 100 Streets
programme.desc: British drama following the tangled, interconnected lives of a group of Londoners, including a womanising former rugby star and his estranged wife. Starring Idris Elba and Gemma Arterton

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: A whaling ship sets sail from New England in 1820, only to come under attack from a gigantic whale that seems to want revenge on them. In the aftermath of the attack, the surviving members of the crew face further physical and moral challenges as they try to stay alive on the open sea. Fact-based historical adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy and Ben Whishaw

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowe's romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: Iona
programme.desc: A woman fleeing the aftermath of a violent crime seeks refuge on the Scottish island where she grew up, bringing her teenage son with her. Her return has serious ramifications for the friends she left behind, while the boy grows to understand a simpler way of life than he is used to and discovers why his mother rebelled against it. Drama, starring Ruth Negga and Douglas Henshall

programme.title: Already Tomorrow In Hong Kong
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a toy designer visiting Hong Kong gets talking to an expat American businessman. Romantic drama starring Jamie Chung and Bryan Greenberg

programme.title: A Patch of Fog
programme.desc: A famous writer and academic living off the reputation of his single novel resorts to shoplifting to introduce some excitement to his stable life. He is caught in the act by a lonely, unbalanced security guard, who has an unusual price for his silence - he wants them to be friends, and goes to disturbing lengths to force himself into the author's life. Thriller, starring Stephen Graham, Conleth Hill and Lara Pulver

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Life On The Line
programme.desc: The head of a power line team is sent in to fix the grid just as a huge storm hits Texas. True-life action thriller, starring John Travolta, Kate Bosworth and Sharon Stone

programme.title: Die Hard 4.0
programme.desc: Tough New York cop John McClane is sent to escort a computer hacker to Washington for questioning. During this routine operation he stumbles on a criminal mastermind's plan to launch a technological terrorist attack on the US, and is forced to enlist the hacker's aid in foiling the evil scheme. Action thriller sequel, with Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long and Maggie Q

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: When a cosmic blunder leaves Earth in the path of an asteroid, it's up to Sid the sloth and pals Manny and Diego to save the day. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, Denis Leary and John Leguizamo

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enters a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmother's house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: Devoted husband and father Michael Sullivan leads a secret life as a hitman, but faces a crisis when his son witnesses his involvement in a killing. The lad promises to keep his mouth shut, but one of Sullivan's fellow gangsters wipes out the rest of his family - forcing father and son to go on the run together. Sam Mendes' crime drama set in Depression-era Chicago, starring Tom Hanks, Paul Newman, Jude Law, Daniel Craig and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris(n)

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett(n)

programme.title: American Fable
programme.desc: When 11-year-old Gitty discovers that her beloved father is hiding a wealthy man in her family's silo in order to save their struggling farm, she is forced to choose between saving the man's life or protecting her family from the consequences of their actions. Thriller, starring Peyton Kennedy, Richard Schiff and Kip Pardue(n)

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head(n)

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Daredevil explorers Rick and Evelyn O'Connell are called into action when their son accidentally resurrects the evil Chinese Emperor Han from his ancient tomb. The family now faces a race against time to prevent the merciless leader from awakening his vast terracotta army in a plot to take over the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Maria Bello, Jet Li and Michelle Yeoh(n)

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A teenager discovers his new neighbour is the writer of a popular series of books, who harbours a terrifying secret. The ghosts and monsters the author writes about are real, and his stories keep them contained. The youngster accidentally releases them into the real world, and has to find a way to get them back in the books before they can cause chaos. Fantasy adventure, starring Jack Black and Dylan Minnette(n)

programme.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
programme.desc: Homeless busker James Bowen has a life-changing moment when a tabby cat walks into his life. Comedy-drama based on the best selling novel, starring Luke Treadaway, Ruta Gedmintas and Anthony Head(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: A gangster in 1970s Boston agrees to collaborate with an FBI agent in the hope of eliminating their common enemy - the Italian Mafia. However, the arrangement soon spirals out of control as the mobster uses his insider knowledge to outwit the law and consolidate his own power. Fact-based gangster drama, starring Johnny Depp, Benedict Cumberbatch, Joel Edgerton, Dakota Johnson and Kevin Bacon(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson

programme.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
programme.desc: A part-time frogman accidentally discovers a cargo of lost treasure in the hold of a sunken Spanish galleon, and sets out to retrieve it with the aid of a yoga expert. Musical adventure, starring Elvis Presley, Dodie Marshall and Elsa Lanchester

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A lowly insurance clerk tries to curry favour with his seedy manager by lending him his flat for his extramarital flings. But the clerk soon grows wise to the nastiness of corporate ethics and infidelity when his heartless boss seduces the elevator girl, whom he has always loved from afar. Oscar-winning comedy drama, directed by Billy Wilder and starring Jack Lemmon, Fred MacMurray and Shirley MacLaine

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy reboot, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast

programme.title: Three Amigos
programme.desc: Three silent Western movie stars are summoned to Mexico for what they think will be a public appearance - only to discover the locals really believe in their heroic abilities and expect them to rid their town of a group of evil bandits. Comedy, starring Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Two sisters have little in common - one is a financially irresponsible flirt and the other is a mature and staid lawyer. However, the pair are brought together when a dark family secret comes to light. Curtis Hanson's comedy drama, based on a novel by Jennifer Weiner, starring Cameron Diaz, Toni Collette and Shirley MacLaine

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: God tires of a down-on-his-luck reporter's constant complaining, so passes on His powers to give him a taste of ultimate responsibility. The newsman falls in love with his extraordinary abilities - but a never-ending stream of incoming prayers and his ambitious attempt to please everyone soon prove there is more to the job than meets the eye. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron

programme.title: Jackass 3.5
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his death-defying team of pranksters embark on even more strange and disturbing stunts in this compilation of material filmed for the third movie in the comedy series. Gags featured include misuse of a defibrillator machine and provoking an alligator

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Four students hit the road, heading off on a foolhardy mission to retrieve an embarrassing video mistakenly sent to an unsuspecting girlfriend - but it is not long before things go wrong and they end up having several nasty scrapes. Comedy, starring Tom Green as the tale's narrator, with Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo and DJ Qualls

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A hard-working businessman gets his hands on a remote control that enables him to manipulate all aspects of his life - including fast-forwarding through the bits he would rather miss. However, the device takes on a mind of its own and starts causing him to skip entire years. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Christopher Walken and Kate Beckinsale

programme.title: What About Bob
programme.desc: A psychiatrist takes on a friend's client, who turns out to be a well-meaning but annoying neurotic barely able to leave his home. The patient is hugely impressed by the consultant's methods, leading him to follow the therapist on holiday, where he unwittingly proceeds to make his life hell while winning over his family. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty and Charlie Korsmo

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: A recently divorced bookshop owner finds love with a glamorous Hollywood film star, but ends up the focus of unwanted media interest - which makes maintaining a relationship a tricky proposition. Romantic comedy written by Richard Curtis, starring Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Rhys Ifans, Emma Chambers, James Dreyfus and Gina McKee

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Singleton Jane is literally always the bridesmaid and never the bride, a role she assumes for the 28th time when her sister announces she is getting married - to a man Jane is secretly in love with. As she wrestles with her feelings, Jane's predicament attracts the attention of a reporter fascinated by her story. Romantic comedy, starring Katherine Heigl, James Marsden and Malin Akerman

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: A Playboy bunny is ejected from Hugh Hefner's mansion for being considered over-the-hill on her 27th birthday, and has to find a new home and a fresh role in life. She becomes the unlikely house mother for a dowdy college sorority, and sets about giving its inmates a pin-up style makeover and turning their social lives around. Comedy, starring Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone and Kat Dennings

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: An unreliable but good-natured slob is called upon to look after his trouble-making nephew and nieces while their parents are away - and what starts as a disaster soon changes for the better as the unlikely babysitter gets to grips with the finer points of being a responsible adult. Family comedy, starring John Candy, Macaulay Culkin, Jean Kelly, Gaby Hoffman, Amy Madigan and Laurie Metcalf

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters are reunited when their parents decide to sell the house they grew up in. They return to the family home to clear out their childhood bedrooms, but with their parents away, seize the chance to relive their teenage years and throw one last wild house party. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler, Tina Fey and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha

programme.title: Grimsby
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated at birth, the younger growing up to be MI6's top agent while the older becomes a layabout football hooligan. When they are finally reunited, the dim-witted elder sibling ends up helping his brother foil an evil plan that threatens the entire world. Action comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong and Rebel Wilson

programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: A gay Austrian fashion journalist becomes a figure of hate in his own country, and heads to America in search of celebrity with his adoring assistant in tow. He embarks on a campaign of publicity stunts to make himself famous, encountering prejudice and meeting people similarly desperate for stardom. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen and Gustaf Hammarsten(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: A lowly fish-tank cleaner working at a gigolo's luxurious house has his eyes opened to a completely new way of life - but an accident with his employer's prized pets puts him into a tricky situation. Desperate to raise a quick buck, he is soon entertaining a series of increasingly sex-crazed women. Comedy, starring Rob Schneider, William Forsythe, Eddie Griffin, Oded Fehr and Gail O'Grady(n)

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detective's well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy reboot, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast(n)

programme.title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
programme.desc: A self-promoting writer is offered a position on the staff of a New York fashion magazine thanks to his irreverent views on the world of celebrity. However, he soon discovers his opinions render him incapable of relating to the superficial personalities he is expected to work with, not to mention his egotistical boss. Comedy based on Toby Young's memoirs, starring Simon Pegg, Kirsten Dunst, Jeff Bridges, Megan Fox and Gillian Anderson(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: An American police college lowers its entrance requirements in the hope of attracting new recruits, and in response, assorted dubious candidates turn up for enrolment. A short-tempered instructor is determined to weed out the bad apples, but a riot provides the clueless cops with a chance to prove their worth. Comedy, starring Steve Guttenberg, Kim Cattrall, Bubba Smith and GW Bailey(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town
programme.desc: A bad-tempered dentist has a near-death experience and finds himself able to see ghosts. He is irritated to find that all the spirits need him to sort out their unresolved problems from when they were alive, particularly a man who wants the grouchy dentist to stop his widow from remarrying. Comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear and Tea Leoni(n)

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: Two mismatched detectives are forced to work together for the first time to track down a crime kingpin who has introduced a new, undetectable narcotic to the streets - but they struggle to get along. Comedy spoofing the 1970s cop show, starring Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Vince Vaughn and Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy(n)

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: A military officer is sent to Iraq after the downfall of Saddam Hussein on a mission to find the weapons of mass destruction that were used to justify the invasion - only to be warned by a CIA agent that no such devices exist. As he continues his fruitless search, he discovers evidence of a political conspiracy. Paul Greengrass's thriller, starring Matt Damon, Greg Kinnear and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean Archer captures terrorist Castor Troy, the man who killed his son. While Troy is in a coma, Archer has the crook's face surgically grafted onto his own so he can go undercover and locate a bomb planted somewhere in Los Angeles. But then Troy regains consciousness - and in turn takes on Archer's identity. John Woo's action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Travolta, Joan Allen, Gina Gershon and Dominique Swain

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Federal marshal Pete Nessip escorts a convicted computer hacker to a new facility. Events soon spiral out of control and the convict escapes, killing Pete's brother on the way. The tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture the fugitive and avenge his sibling's death. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Gary Busey, Yancy Butler and Michael Jeter

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: The heavyweight champion is forced into retirement due to brain damage inflicted in the ring, and finds his fortune has been lost on the stock market by his accountant. Returning to his working-class roots, he trains an up-and-coming fighter, only to see his protege turn against him. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire and real-life boxer Tommy Morrison

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: The ageing fighter contemplates a return to the ring when a computer simulation reveals he would have defeated the current world heavyweight champion Mason `The Line' Dixon, who responds by challenging Rocky to face him for real. Boxing drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Antonio Tarver, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young, Milo Ventimiglia and Tony Burton

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Account of the life of medieval Scottish hero William Wallace. After the slaughter of his father and brother, young Wallace is taken in by his uncle, who teaches him how to use not only his brawn but his brain - which he employs to great effect years later when he resolves to drive the English out of Scotland. Oscar-winning historical epic, directed by and starring Mel Gibson. With Patrick McGoohan, Sophie Marceau and Catherine McCormack

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: A respected fighter in China at the turn of the 20th century returns from self-imposed exile with the intention of passing on his knowledge. Wary of his status as a national hero, foreign powers based in China challenge him to enter a tournament so their own champions can destroy him. Martial arts adventure, based on a true story, starring Jet Li and Shido Nakamura. In Mandarin, Japanese and English

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A vampire fights a war against werewolves that has raged for centuries, with the human race oblivious to the conflict. She falls in love with a mortal man who has wandered unwittingly into the midst of a conflict, and must protect him from both the enemy, who have plans for him, and her own side. Supernatural action thriller, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen and Bill Nighy

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr

Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle(n)

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: Secret agent Black Widow is forced into an uneasy alliance with vigilante the Punisher on a vital mission. A notorious terrorist organisation has stolen dangerous top-secret technology, and it falls to the mismatched pair to stop them selling it to the highest bidder. Animated comic-book adventure, with the voices of Jennifer Carpenter and Brian Bloom(n)

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer(n)

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: Seven youngsters discover an old map and set out on the adventure of a lifetime to save their homes from a land developer by finding a legendary pirate's hidden treasure. However, they first have to navigate a series of booby-trapped underground caverns and outwit a family of crooks also after the loot. Children's adventure, starring Sean Astin, Corey Feldman, Josh Brolin and Martha Plimpton(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Wizarding Brit Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical creatures that proceed to cause chaos. Harry Potter prequel, starring Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back to Africa and into a trap. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Wizarding Brit Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical creatures that proceed to cause chaos. Harry Potter prequel, starring Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Excitable beat cop Ben longs to work alongside his fiancee's brother, hard-boiled detective James, who does not think he has what it takes. James decides to show Ben that he is not cut out for the job by recruiting him to help bring a drug dealer to justice. Comedy sequel, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Olivia Munn(n)

programme.title: xXx2: The Next Level
programme.desc: The American secretary of defence forms a covert military organisation with the intention of assassinating the president. A government spymaster is ready to foil the plot but, since his top agent is dead, he has to recruit an imprisoned soldier to help him. Action sequel, starring Ice Cube, Samuel L Jackson and Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: My Favorite Martian
programme.desc: A TV journalist meets a stranded alien who is trying to repair his crashed spacecraft. After first planning to exploit the chance of a big story, he instead offers his help after befriending the visitor - but a fellow reporter plans to expose the truth. Sci-fi comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Christopher Lloyd, Jeff Daniels, Elizabeth Hurley and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: In Search of the Castaways
programme.desc: The two children of a missing sea captain receive a message in a bottle that convinces them their father is still alive. Enlisting an eccentric French professor to help them find him, they embark on round-the-world journey and face natural disasters and mutineers during the voyage. Children's adventure based on a novel by Jules Verne, starring Maurice Chevalier, Hayley Mills and George Sanders

programme.title: Benji the Hunted
programme.desc: Talented mongrel Benji is separated from his trainer in a shipwreck and ends up stranded in the Canadian wilderness - where he becomes foster father to a litter of orphaned cougar cubs. However, a hungry timber wolf is also prowling in the area, and looks set to clash with the courageous dog. Disney adventure, starring Red Steagall, Frank Inn and Nancy Francis

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the Disney animation, in which Copper the dog joins a country music band of strays. However, his taste of fame leads him to neglect old friend Tod the fox. With the voices of Patrick Swayze, Reba McEntire, Harrison Fahn and Jonah Bobo

programme.title: Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search for Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Christopher Robin starts school and leaves a note for Winnie the Pooh explaining why he will not be around any more. However, the bear misunderstands the message and becomes convinced his friend is in grave danger, organising the other animals into a rescue attempt. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and John Fiedler

programme.title: Lilo & Stitch
programme.desc: A manic, mischievous alien escapes from the galactic police and crash-lands his spaceship on Hawaii. A lonely little girl mistakes the stranded creature for a dog and adopts him - but alien and Earth authorities are soon combing the island in search of him. Disney animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Daveigh Chase, Chris Sanders, Tia Carrere, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search for Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Christopher Robin starts school and leaves a note for Winnie the Pooh explaining why he will not be around any more. However, the bear misunderstands the message and becomes convinced his friend is in grave danger, organising the other animals into a rescue attempt. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jim Cummings and John Fiedler

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: A mad scientist kidnaps a beagle to use as a guinea pig in his deranged experiments. But an accidental injection leaves the mutt with awe-inspiring superpowers, which he uses to foil the deranged inventor's plans to take over a city. Comedy adventure, starring Peter Dinklage and James Belushi, and featuring the voices of Jason Lee and Amy Adams

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp

programme.title: Lilo & Stitch
programme.desc: A manic, mischievous alien escapes from the galactic police and crash-lands his spaceship on Hawaii. A lonely little girl mistakes the stranded creature for a dog and adopts him - but alien and Earth authorities are soon combing the island in search of him. Disney animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Daveigh Chase, Chris Sanders, Tia Carrere, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers

programme.title: The Jungle Book

The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck barman is having a hard time coping after his wife leaves him and he loses his teaching job. His fortunes turn around when the American football team he has supported all his life holds open trials and, against all odds, he wins a place on the squad. Fact-based sporting drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear and Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Jungle 2 Jungle
programme.desc: A businessman ventures deep into the Amazon to look for his estranged doctor wife seeking a divorce, only to discover he has a 13-year-old son who has been raised as part of a jungle tribe. The boy is sent back to New York with his father, but has a lot to learn about the modern world. Comedy, starring Tim Allen, Lolita Davidovich, Martin Short, JoBeth Williams and Sam Huntington

programme.title: The Shaggy DA
programme.desc: A boy who once turned into a dog grows up to become a principled lawyer, who runs for district attorney. However, as he campaigns against the crooked current DA, he finds himself once again undergoing a canine transformation and must find out the cause while keeping his condition a secret. Sequel to Disney comedy The Shaggy Dog, starring Dean Jones and Suzanne Pleshette

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: Zootropolis
programme.desc: In a city populated by animals, a rabbit achieves her dream of becoming the first bunny to become a police officer - but faces prejudice at every turn. When the disappearance of an otter hints at a terrible conspiracy in the city, she enlists the aid of a con-artist fox in solving the mystery. Disney animated comedy, with the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush

Disney animated comedy, with the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: The swashbuckling rogues join forces with old foe Barbossa to take on villainous Lord Beckett. But first they have to journey to the ends of the Earth to free Captain Jack Sparrow from his hellish imprisonment in Davy Jones' Locker. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley and Chow Yun-Fat, and featuring a cameo appearance by Keith Richards

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson(n)

programme.title: White Fang 2: The Myth of the White Wolf
programme.desc: A white boy races to the aid of Native Americans with the help of his fearless hound, in a bid to prevent their sacred tribal ground being taken over by miners. Adventure sequel set during the Alaskan Gold Rush, and inspired by Jack London's novel, starring Scott Bairstow, Alfred Molina, Charmaine Craig and Geoffrey Lewis(n)

programme.title: Now You See Him, Now You Don't
programme.desc: A science student creates an invisibility spray, an invention that could help save his college from financial ruin - but it soon attracts the attention of a gang of scheming crooks wanting to use it for more dishonest ends. Disney adventure, sequel to The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes, starring Kurt Russell, Cesar Romero, Joe Flynn and Jim Backus(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly(n)

programme.title: Frankenweenie
programme.desc: A lonely boy uses electricity to bring his dead dog back to life. However, the presence of the animal in the neighbourhood leads to panic over a monster, while the young scientist's classmates are soon also meddling with life and death to revive their own pets. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Charlie Tahan and Winona Ryder(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Secret of the Wings
programme.desc: The fairy becomes curious about the mysterious winter forest where fairies never dare to go. She travels into the cold woods, where she meets a new friend and uncovers a threat to both their homes that they must work together to prevent. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Lucy Hale, Anjelica Huston and Timothy Dalton(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
programme.desc: A single-minded American golfer's determination helps him to overcome the sport's class prejudice against his working-class background and his father's cynicism for the chance to test his skills against his idol in the 1913 US Open. Fact-based drama directed by Bill Paxton, starring Shia LaBeouf, Stephen Dillane, Elias Koteas and Josh Flitter(n)

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: An evil druid wreaks havoc on ancient Britain, determined to wipe out the Celtic people. A young warrior who has been driven into exile joins forces with a hermit wizard to stop his reign of terror and save their people from annihilation. Fantasy adventure, starring Kirk Barker and Stefan Butler

programme.title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left in the temporary care of a friend when their owners are forced to move away. Thinking they have been abandoned, the trio hit the road in a bid to find their way home. Adventure, featuring the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Don Ameche. Kim Greist, Robert Hays and Benj Thall take the human roles

programme.title: The Big Green
programme.desc: An English teacher provides her American pupils with an introduction to the joys of soccer, giving them the pride and ability to take on the best at the state championships, and winning the heart of the local sheriff along the way. Sporting comedy, starring Steve Guttenberg, Olivia d'Abo and Jay O Sanders

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: Arch-villainess Divatox plots to take over the Earth by corrupting the powers of a kindly old wizard, and only the colour-coded crusaders, joined by old team-mates Jason and Kimberley, stand in her way. Sci-fi adventure, with Jason David Frank and Johnny Yong Bosch

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: A youngster is forced to stage his own death to escape his cruel father, and embarks on a series of adventures accompanied by a runaway slave in 19th-century Mississippi. Disney adaptation of Mark Twain's classic tale, starring Elijah Wood, Courtney B Vance, Robbie Coltrane, Jason Robards, Dana Ivey, Anne Heche and Ron Perlman

programme.title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left to fend for themselves on the streets of San Francisco when their owners fly off on holiday and accidentally leave them behind. As they join a tough group of strays, they must avoid falling into the clutches of the sinister dog catchers. Adventure sequel, with the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Ralph Waite

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher

programme.title: Race to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: An ex-convict cab driver becomes the protector of two aliens disguised as children who claim to hold the key to Earth's continued existence. As he races against time to return the visitors to their spaceship, he must also hold off hostile government agents and a sinister extraterrestrial assassin. Sci-fi adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, AnnaSophia Robb, Alexander Ludwig and Carla Gugino

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: The Easter bunny's son is about to take over the chocolate-delivering business, but rejects his responsibilities and heads for Hollywood to seek fame and fortune as a drummer. He makes life difficult for the directionless slacker who takes him in, but they must work together to avert a crisis on Easter island. Part-animated comedy, starring James Marsden, with the voice of Russell Brand

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
