programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks

programme.title: Punching Henry
programme.desc: A journeyman comedian (Henry Phillips) is lured to L.A. by a TV producer (J.K. Simmons) who wants to make him a reality star. As reality sets in, he must decide whether his legacy will be to tell jokes for a living or become the butt of them, in this glimpse behind the weird world of comedy. Sarah Silverman, Tig Notaro, Jim Jefferies and Doug Stanhope also star

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: Half Baked
programme.desc: Three New York City pothead friends (Dave Chappelle, Guillermo Diaz and Jim Breuer), turn to dealing drugs after their friend and roommate (Harland Williams) is arrested for accidentally killing a police horse. While the trio is selling pharmaceutical marijuana to raise the bail money, Thurgood (Chappelle) tries to hide this fact from his straight edge girlfriend (Rachel True)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: No-holds barred stand-up comedian Godfrey performs a riotous set in his hometown of Chicago

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this remake of the action classic about a lethal assassin who travels to Bangkok to perform a quartet of hits but falls in love with a beautiful, deaf pharmacist, and takes a young hustler under his wing as a protege. Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: Released from prison after taking the fall for a group of his friends, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) just wants to get his life on track. But when he takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan) and reconnects with his old friend Willie (Joaquin Phoenix), Leo finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs and murder. Featuring Charlize Theron, Faye Dunaway and Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a publicity stunt brings the New York Rangers and the national spotlight to Mystery, Alaska for a game against the local team of weekend warriors, the town rises to meet the challenge of a lifetime. Russell Crowe, Hank Azaria, and Burt Reynolds lead an all-star cast

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy(n)

Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Punching Henry
programme.desc: A journeyman comedian (Henry Phillips) is lured to L.A. by a TV producer (J.K. Simmons) who wants to make him a reality star. programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: Popular high school teacher Jim McAllister (Matthew Broderick) is secretly annoyed with perky overachieving student Tracy Flick (Reese Witherspoon), so he goes to extreme lengths to make sure Tracy loses an upcoming class election. This award-winning dark comedy from writer and director Alexander Payne (Citizen Ruth) costars Chris Klein, Jessica Campbell and Mark Harelik(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life(n)

programme.title: Election

programme.title: Siblings
programme.desc: As the purged Cardinals are dismissed and stripped of their titles and wealth, one of them angrily sets the Vatican treasury ablaze. Incensed by the new King Ferdinand's arrogant refusal to accept Giovanni as Lucrezia's child, Cesare travels to Naples to fix the problem. After Lucrezia and Alfonso's wedding, Alfonso realizes that the political sands are shifting - and not in his favor. Upset, he abandons Lucrezia alone on their wedding night, driving her into the arms of someone else(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Banquet Of Chestnuts
programme.desc: Newly appointed Cardinal Farnese is placed in the Treasury and quickly discovers Versucci's theft. Micheletto is sent to find the wayward Cardinal. Meanwhile, upon hearing of Venice's request for help, Alexander, seeing this as an opportunity to replenish the coffers, dramatically calls for a Crusade. The Cardinals participate in the "banquet of chestnuts". Elsewhere, King Ferdinand learns that Lucrezia and Alfonso's marriage has not been consummated(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this remake of the action classic about a lethal assassin who travels to Bangkok to perform a quartet of hits but falls in love with a beautiful, deaf pharmacist, and takes a young hustler under his wing as a protege. Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed

programme.title: Three Men And A Baby
programme.desc: Three handsome Manhattan bachelors find their dating and mating rituals irreparably altered when a baby, the lovechild of one of the men, shows up on their doorstep. Stars Tom Selleck, Steve Guttenberg and Ted Danson

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: Popular high school teacher Jim McAllister (Matthew Broderick) is secretly annoyed with perky overachieving student Tracy Flick (Reese Witherspoon), so he goes to extreme lengths to make sure Tracy loses an upcoming class election. This award-winning dark comedy from writer and director Alexander Payne (Citizen Ruth) costars Chris Klein, Jessica Campbell and Mark Harelik

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves

programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Gary Owen shares stories of being married to the daughter of a founding member of the Black Panthers, being the father of young teenagers and, of course, his hillbilly family. programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The iron-willed comic book vigilante Frank Castle (a.k.a. "The Punisher") wages a one-man war on the New York mobsters that murdered his family in this action thriller starring Ray Stevenson, Dominic West and Julie Benz

programme.title: Claire in Motion
programme.desc: Three weeks after Claire's husband mysteriously disappears, the police end their investigation. Claire doesn't give up, and soon discovers his troubling secrets, including a graduate student with whom he had formed a close bond. As she digs deeper, Claire begins to lose her grip on how well she truly knew her husband and questions her own identity in the process

programme.title: Three Men And A Baby

programme.desc: Cooper Tilson (Dennis Quaid) and his wife Leah (Golden Globe winner Sharon Stone) are New Yorkers wanting to escape city life for the saner, safer countryside. They move their two children into a dilapidated old mansion filled with the possessions of the previous family. Turning it into their dream house becomes a living nightmare when the previous owner (Stephen Dorff) shows up, and a series of terrifying incidents leads them on a search for clues to the estate's dark and lurid past

programme.title: The Drone Queen

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: In 2013, Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) quietly leaves his job at the NSA and flies to Hong Kong. There, he meets with two journalists and a filmmaker, and reveals U.S. government cyber surveillance programs of epic proportions. A top security contractor with virtuoso programming skills, Ed has discovered that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled tracking all forms of digital communication - not just from foreign governments and terror groups, but from ordinary Americans(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A notorious 1971 bank robbery in London is the basis for this exciting, suspenseful thriller starring Jason Statham as a car dealer who agrees to the dangerous heist in order to finance a new family but gets more than he bargains for when the break-in yields not just riches but a slew of valuable state secrets. Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Renée Zellweger star in this inspiring tale of a promising boxer who battles the odds and a heavyweight champion to support his family during the Depression. Academy Award® winner Ron Howard directs(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation(n)

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought(n)

When the fights succeed beyond their wildest expectations, they're swept up in a chain of events that end in the first mixed-martial arts ban in the nation. The film chronicles the inception of Caliguri and Viola's first bouts and the colorful cast of fighters who made them a hit

programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two young, passionate magicians are friends and partners until one fateful night when their biggest trick goes terribly wrong. Now the bitterest of enemies, they will stop at nothing - including deceit and sabotage - to learn each other's secrets. Their obsessive rivalry takes over their lives, and not everything is what it seems. Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine and Scarlett Johansson star

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham returns in this second action-packed sequel as professional driver and tough guy Frank Martin, this time called upon to deliver a kidnapped politician's daughter from France to the Ukraine while dodging a series of killers bent on stopping him l literally dead in his tracks. Natalya Rudakova costars with Robert Knepper and Jeroen Krabbe

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic

programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special

programme.desc: Small town girl Jamie (Casey Calvert) makes the difficult decision to tell her parents that she is in a same sex relationship. Unfortunately, her family does not react well to the news and Jamie decides to go to Los Angeles to visit her best friend Sarah (Scarlet Red). Jamie is happy to find California is far more accepting. Finally able to be who she really is, Jamie meets a woman named Pam. As things heat up between Jamie and Pam, Sarah begins acting strange(n)

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme is Chance Boudreaux, a New Orleans merchant sailor who uses his martial arts skills to battle a band of hunters preying on homeless veterans in a deadly safari game. The organizers of the safari, Emil (Lance Henriksen) and Pik (Arnold Vosloo), are former mercenaries who devise their murderous game purely as a business venture. This leads to a deadly contest between Emil and Chance, which spans from the streets of New Orleans to the treacherous Louisiana bayous(n)

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The iron-willed comic book vigilante Frank Castle (a.k.a. "The Punisher") wages a one-man war on the New York mobsters that murdered his family in this action thriller starring Ray Stevenson, Dominic West and Julie Benz(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Academy Award winner, Denzel Washington, is Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer whose dreams are destroyed when he's wrongfully accused of murder. Carter is sentenced to three life terms in prison, where he decides to channel his frustration and despair by writing his own story from his cell. A teenager reads the autobiography and begins corresponding with him. Convinced of Carter's innocence, the teen enlists his social activist guardians to mount a full-time campaign to prove the truth and get Carter released(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Jet Li stars as real life martial arts legend Huo Yuanjia, who becomes the most famous and revered fighter in all of China. Along the way, he creates the Jin Wu Sports Federation, and comes to be it's spiritual guru(n)

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure(n)

programme.title: Andrew Santino: Home Field Advantage
programme.desc: Half Mick, half WOP, hard-headed comedian Andrew Santino returns to his Chicago hometown for a stand-up special with the authentic taste of a city made of Italian beef, Old Style and deep dish. Shot at the historic Vic Theater, Santino touches on everything from growing up thinking he was black and a disgust with bachelorette parties, to his bouts with severe acne and male porn stars envy(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Tears and Tortillas
programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Finding Vivian Maier
programme.desc: Documentary about mysterious nanny Vivian Maier, who secretly took over 100,000 photographs that were hidden in storage lockers to be discovered decades later, and is now considered among the 20th century's greatest photographers. Her strange and riveting life and art is revealed through never before seen photographs, films, and interviews with dozens who thought they knew her

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: Five years after the death of her beloved husband, a woman meets a man who seems to be his exact replica. As she falls for this stranger, she can't bring herself to tell him the truth about what attracted her but the it must come out. Stars Annette Bening, Ed Harris and Robin Williams

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Hannah Montana: The Movie
programme.desc: When Miley Stewart (aka pop-star Hannah Montana) gets too caught up in the superstar celebrity lifestyle, her dad decides it's time for a change of scenery: Miley must trade-in the glitz and glamour of Hollywood and return to the family farm in Tennessee to face the most important decision of her life - with a little help from her friends & guest stars Taylor Swift, Rascal Flatts and Vanessa Williams: can she be both Miley Stewart and Hannah Montana?(n)

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: For two centuries, Andrew, a popular robot model, learns all he might about the intricacies of humanity, life and love, and teaches as much as he learns. Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: An American Rhapsody
programme.desc: The daughter of Budapest intellectuals (Tony Goldwyn and Nastassja Kinski), 15-year-old Suzanne (Scarlett Johansson) was raised by a childless couple in rural Hungary before being reunited with her parents, living in Los Angeles. Now, feeling out of place in the land of Elvis and the cheeseburger, rebellious Suzanne returns to Hungary to reconnect with her family's history(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance(n)

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben (Ben Affleck) has to get from New York to Savannah for his wedding. Everything is under control, until a young woman named Sarah (Sandra Bullock) literally falls into his life. Ben and Sarah's plane goes skidding off the runway and he inadvertently saves Sarah's life, only to find that he has inherited an unlikely travel companion. After being detained, derailed and disrobed, Ben realizes that he's developing a definite attraction to the sexy and impetuous Sarah and the feeling is decidedly mutual

programme.title: Heartbreakers (2001)
programme.desc: Experts at seducing and fleecing wealthy men, mother-daughter grifters Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt arrive in Palm Beach, Florida, where they target an aging tobacco baron (Gene Hackman) and the owner (Jason Lee) of a beachside tavern. Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft and Nora Dunn costar in this comedy from the writer of "Liar Liar."

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with

programme.title: Finding Vivian Maier
programme.desc: Documentary about mysterious nanny Vivian Maier, who secretly took over 100,000 photographs that were hidden in storage lockers to be discovered decades later, and is now considered among the 20th century's greatest photographers. Her strange and riveting life and art is revealed through never before seen photographs, films, and interviews with dozens who thought they knew her

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change(n)

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: From Darren Lynn Bousman, the director of SAW II, III and IV, MOTHER'S DAY is a graphic remake of the horror classic. After a bank robbery gone wrong, three brothers go home to hide out, only to discover that their mother (Rebecca De Mornay) lost their house in a foreclosure. The new owners become the depraved brothers' unwitting hostages. Their sadistic mother soon arrives and brilliantly takes control of the situation, ratcheting up the terror(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Cut in Half
programme.desc: Two Muslim sisters and their family must cope with the eldest daughter's leukemia diagnosis and her decisions about life and death. Directed by Susan Seidelman (‘Desperately Seeking Susan'). Written by Leen Shumman(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication(n)

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: Monterey Pop
programme.desc: Concert documentary of the Monterey International Pop Festival, held in June 1967. Performers include Jimi Hendrix, Ravi Shankar, Janis Joplin and Big Brother & the Holding Company, the Mamas & the Papas, Jefferson Airplane and the Who. (cc)

programme.title: Dont Look Back
programme.desc: Excerpts from a Bob Dylan concert tour of England in 1965 include a look at the musician offstage. Features appearances by Joan Baez and Donovan. Directed by D.A. Pennebaker. (cc)

programme.title: The Sky Divers
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the 1969 film "The Gypsy Moths," starring Burt Lancaster as a barnstorming sky diver. John Frankenheimer is the director. Narrated by Wink Martindale

programme.title: Gimme Shelter
programme.desc: The music of Mick Jagger and the Rolling Stones punctuates this record of their 1969 U.S. tour, culminating in the harrowing rock festival at Altamont Speedway, Cal. Ike and Tina Turner. George Lucas was one of the cameramen. (cc)

programme.title: Woodstock Three Days of Peace and Music
programme.desc: The Director's Cut of the Oscar-winning film about the legendary celebration that drew 500,000 people to a New York farm in August 1969. Performers include Jimi Hendrix, the Who, Santana, Sly and the Family Stone and Ten Years After. Michael Wadleigh directed

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix
programme.desc: The groundbreaking guitarist (1942-70) is profiled through concert footage and interviews. Included: scenes from "Monterey Pop" and "Woodstock"; interviews with Eric Clapton, Peter Townshend, Mick Jagger and Al Hendrix (Jimi's father). (cc)

programme.title: Angel on My Shoulder
programme.desc: The devil agrees to release a recently murdered gangster back to Earth if he'll take over the body of an honest judge and make him do bad deeds. The criminal, eager to settle the score with his killer, finds out being bad isn't so easy in his new guise. (cc)

programme.title: Angels in the Outfield
programme.desc: The ill-tempered manager of the lowly Pittsburgh Pirates makes a deal with a celestial being to change his combative ways in return for some divine help on the diamond. And when an orphan girl claims she can see the angels lending a hand to the players, things really take an interesting turn. Hall-of-Famers Ty Cobb and Joe DiMaggio have cameos. (cc)

programme.title: The Heavenly Body
programme.desc: When an astronomer neglects his wife in favor of late-night stargazing, her studies in astrology lead her to a handsome interloper. (cc)

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A man and his second wife arrange a séance with local medium Madame Arcati. who accidentally summons the spirit of his first wife, who decides to hang around and disrupt his new marriage

programme.title: Topper
programme.desc: Classic about merry spirits (Constance Bennett, Cary Grant) making mischief for the living. Roland Young, Billie Burke. Wilkins: Alan Mowbray. Mrs. Stuyvesant: Hedda Hopper. Casey: Eugene Pallette. Bellhop: Arthur Lake. Norman Z. McLeod directed. (cc)

programme.title: Topper Returns
programme.desc: A mistakenly murdered woman's ghost seeks Topper's help to find the killer and perhaps save the true target in this farcical spoof of murder mysteries featuring ghosts, relatives and foul play. (cc)

programme.title: I Married a Witch
programme.desc: The spirit of a 17th century sorceress rematerializes in 1942 New England and falls head over heels in love with a young, handsome politician

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Two male musicians go on the lam posing as women in an all-girl orchestra after witnessing a gangland massacre in 1929 Chicago. (cc)

programme.title: A Night at the Opera
programme.desc: The Marx Brothers spoof the opera world as a penny-ante promoter promises to arrange entrance into high society for a wealthy dowager if she antes up $200,000 as a patron of the arts. Plenty of gags and music. Watch for the famed "stateroom scene," where untold amounts of people squeeze into tiny quarters on a ship. (cc)

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: A mockumentary following the exploits of a touring heavy-metal band known as Spinal Tap. (cc)

programme.title: Modern Times
programme.desc: Famously choosing to make the film silent well after the age of talkies had begun, Charlie Chaplin used intermittent sound effects to tell this story of The Tramp coping with the industrial age, with the help of an orphan girl he befriends along the way. (cc)

programme.title: To Be or Not to Be
programme.desc: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, a soldier's efforts to catch a German spy become wrapped up with a local theater troupe, who are unexpectedly great at outwitting Axis powers. (cc)

programme.title: MGM Parade
programme.desc: Judy Garland sings "You Made Me Love You," from "Broadway Melody of 1938." Also: clips from "Broadway Melody of 1940," with Fred Astaire, and "It's Always Fair Weather," with Cyd Charisse. George Murphy is the host

programme.title: Zombies on Broadway
programme.desc: Two theater press agents head to a mysterious tropical island to find a genuine creature of the living dead to promote the opening of a nightclub managed by a most-frightening owner

programme.title: The Mysterious Doctor

programme.desc: A singer's life is sent into upheaval after being left at the altar, leaving him to try and put the pieces back together with a waitress. (cc)

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: A kindhearted but socially awkward airport security agent wins the affections of a gorgeous party planner and vows to make the relationship work, despite the misgivings of his friends and family. (cc)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: An inept ABA basketball team that is in danger of folding when the league announces plans to merge with the NBA in 1976. (cc)

programme.title: Casanova
programme.desc: Tale of the amorous exploits of the suave 18th-century Venetian ladies' man whose womanizing ways are disrupted by an engaged cross-dressing feminist. (cc)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: A modern-day fortune hunter races to find an ancient treasure hidden by the Founding Fathers. (cc)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match. (cc)

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A martial-arts expert tracks the drug dealer whose gang was responsible for killing his sister, but he must first win a kung fu competition to get to the crime lord. (cc)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations. (cc)

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four boyhood friends band together as adults when two are accused of killing their sadistic reform-school guard in this adaptation of Lorenzo Carcaterra's novel. (cc)

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: A cat burglar becomes a marked man after witnessing the President's involvement in a woman's murder. Later, he sees the Chief Executive go on a public tirade concerning his stand against violence, and decides to fight for justice. Clint Eastwood co-produced, directed and stars as the thief. (cc)

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: A somber vampire mesmerizes a young reporter with the story of his ghastly transformation from grieving aristocrat to immortal monster, beginning in 18th-century New Orleans with his first encounters with the charismatic and decadent bloodsucker Lestat. The two vamps remain deeply, if reluctantly, connected over the years, while becoming intimately involved with others of their kind, including a mature immortal in a young child's body. (cc)

programme.title: Ouija Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic is stunned when she finds a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her 9-year-old daughter. (cc)

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: A man becomes obsessed with finding his missing girlfriend, but can only find out the truth by entertaining a devil's bargain from her kidnapper. (cc)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: An investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep. (cc)

programme.title: To Be or Not to Be
programme.desc: A down on his luck Polish actor with a straying wife makes a plan to get them both out of the country and escape the impending horrors of the Nazi invasion. (cc)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A self-centered man learns he has an autistic older brother he never knew about after their father dies and leaves the older brother the bulk of his multi-million dollar estate. The younger brother takes his institutionalized sibling on a road trip hoping to get some of the money for himself, but soon the two make a genuine connection. (cc)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her. (cc)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Rowdy friends throw a bachelor party for a groom-to-be, whose future bride infiltrates the bash to test his fidelity. Meanwhile, her rich daddy does his best to stop the wedding. (cc)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned, long-out-of-college pals start an off-campus frat house, then run afoul of the dean. (cc)

programme.title: Wish I Was Here
programme.desc: A 35-year-old father who's never quite grown up learns about life when he's forced to homeschool his kids, since their grandfather can no longer afford their private-school tuition and their public school is a mess. (cc)

programme.title: Anything Else
programme.desc: Woody Allen wrote and directed this mediocre “Annie Hall” wannabe about a writer (Jason Biggs) frustrated by his neurotic girlfriend (Christina Ricci). Allen also costars as the writer's mentor. Cinematographer Darius Khondji make glorious use of New York City locales. (cc)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Biopic of Michael "Eddie the Eagle" Edwards, whose participation in the 1988 Winter Olympics marked the first time a Brit had ever competed at ski jumping. Edwards trains for the sport with a former champ, and later finds fame as a lovable loser who's just trying his best. (cc)

programme.title: The Secret Life of Bees
programme.desc: In 1960s South Carolina, a young white girl and her black caregiver are taken in by an eccentric trio of sisters, in this adaptation of the best seller by Sue Monk Kidd. (cc)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Nine Oscars, including Best Picture, went to this epic drama about an injured World War II cartographer who reveals his tempestuous affair with a colleague's wife to his caring nurse. (cc)(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein investigate a 1972 burglary at the Democratic National Committee headquarters, eventually discovering a cover-up that would lead to President Richard Nixon's resignation. Adaptation of Woodward and Bernstein's book. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, the illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their names and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. However, the mogul soon turns the tables, and forces the group to steal a revolutionary decrypting device for him. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Conspirator
programme.desc: Lawyer Frederick Aiken (James McAvoy) defends Mary Surratt (Robin Wright) from charges of participating in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln, and realizes that she's being used as bait to capture her son, the only conspirator to have eluded justice. Directed by Robert Redford. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon

programme.title: Carlito's Way Rise to Power
programme.desc: A young hustler (Jay Hernandez) rises through the ranks to become a drug czar in New York City's Spanish Harlem in this prequel to 1993's far superior “Carlito's Way.” Sean Combs, Luis Guzman. programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: A young FBI agent goes undercover to investigate a series of hijackings. Rapidly becoming involved in gang activity, including late-night car races, he begins to relate with his subjects and finds himself falling in love with the gang leader's sister. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.desc: Zestawienie tanecznych hitów, które idealnie sprawdzają się na imprezach. W czasie programu widzowie mogą wysyłać wiadomości SMS

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Memorial Service

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Overcome with lottery fever, the gang buys up a block of tickets, causing a division over the division of the potential Powerball winnings. Meanwhile, Chandler learns the fate of his internship at the ad agency. Steve: Phill Lewis. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel has an unsettling dream involving Joey. (Or is it his soap character, Drake?) Ross fills in for Monica on Chandler's weekend getaway. (He's not a cheap date.) And Phoebe, guitar in hand, camps out in front of Monica's restaurant. (Monica isn't amused.) (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Soap Opera Party
programme.desc: Joey's soap-star-studded party helps Rachel forget about getting romantic with her roomie, who catches the eye---and maybe more---of Ross's newest love interest (Aisha Tyler). Meanwhile, Chandler endures the attacks of a man-hater (Alex Borstein) during a wild one-woman show. Daytime actors Matthew Ashford and Kyle Lowder appear in cameos. Dirk: Ethan Erickson. (repeat)

programme.sub-title: My Life: Our Desert Island Home.
programme.desc: My Life: Our Desert Island Home follows the adventures of brothers Felix (11) and Luca (10) who live on an Island called Fofoa in Tonga. After living through the worst tropical cyclone in memory, Felix and Luca enlist a local conservation charity to help them survey their coral reef to see the effects of the storm and check the long term damage from climate change. Protecting the marine life is vital to keep attracting the migrating whales back every year, not least because the boys' favourite hobby is taking visitors swimming to meet these magnificent animals. Join Felix and Luca as they show you what living on an Island is all about

programme.desc: In this programme we visit three children who are all having a fascinating day out. In Russia, seven-year-old Liza picks blueberries with her grandma - and helps turn them into delicious pancakes. In Ghana, Tyra, who's five, goes to the market with her mum and learns how to do the shopping. And in Jordan, Hamza, who's eight, has a day out in town with his dad, and buys a lovely present for his baby sister, Mimi. We see that although children live in different countries, may look different and speak different languages, the joys and discoveries of childhood are universal
